Author: knivmord
Text: I’m the same!!!! I can eat pretty much normally when with friends and family but when i’m on my own i have a panic attack over two spoons of icecream lol. I have no clue what it is but my ed brain has made that rule and I won’t complain, makes it easier hiding it aswell

Author: lightblueheart
Text: Yes, I do do this as well.   Alone I eat small portions and track. On a date or hanging with friends I order normally and restrict for it later.
